name: Strawberry Delight
author: Buckeye chef wannabe
summary: A delightful strawberry dessert that is sure to be eaten quickly.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (9 inch) prepared angel food cake, torn into bite-size pieces
directions: Cream together cream cheese and white sugar in a bowl until smooth
Stir in sour cream, almond extract, and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
Fold remaining 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and confectioners' sugar into thawed whipped topping in a separate bowl until thoroughly combined
Gently fold the whipped topping mixture into the cream cheese mixture until combined
Layer the bottom of a glass serving bowl with 1/4 angel food cake pieces
Top with 1/4 cream mixture and a layer of strawberries; continue layering three more times until all the cake and cream mixture is used
Finish with a layer of strawberries
